items.sentence: If he could pass for eighteen years old, he\'d join the army.
Tom gave Mary an envelope that he wanted her to give to John.
Tom texted Mary to let her know that he was going to be late.
I had the impression that Tom didn\'t know what was going on.
Does Tom know why Mary doesn\'t want to go to Boston with us?
I thought Tom and Mary still didn\'t have driver\'s licenses.
Tom double-checked his bank balance before writing the check.
Tom drove to the store and bought three cans of insect spray.
I don\'t know what happened to Tom to make him act like that.
I don\'t like the way Tom is always fishing for a compliment.
